p: To investigate the anti-inflammatory effects of C. obtusa essential oil, we suspended 1 Ã— 10 6/mL of the monocyte-derived DCs in RPMI-1640 with 10% fetal bovine serum and pretreated them with various concentrations of the essential oil for 1 hour and then stimulated the mixture with 50 ug/ml of endotoxin-removed Alternaria alternata (Greer Lab., Lenoir, NC, USA) or 1 ug/ml of lipopolysaccharide (LPS; Sigma-Aldrich) for 6 hours.
